```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(SuperLearner)
library(ltmle)
library(MASS)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
data <-read.csv("fertility_sperm.csv")
colnames(data)

data <- data %>% 
  mutate(W11 = age,
         W12 = sitting_hour,
         W13 = trauma,
         W14 = case_when(alcohol<0.8 ~ '0',
                         alcohol==0.8 ~ '1',
                         alcohol==1 ~ '2'),
         W2 = case_when(season==-1 ~ 'Winter',
                        season==-0.33 ~'Spring',
                        season==0.33 ~ 'Summer',
                        season==1 ~ 'Fall'),
         A = case_when(smoking==-1 ~ 0,
                       smoking==0 ~ 1,
                       smoking==1 ~ 1),
         Y = ifelse(diagnosis=='N',1,0))

ObsData <- data %>% dplyr::select(W11, W12, W13, W14, W2, A, Y)

```
